exclusion.criterion: Patient not consenting to the study or refused.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Metastatic disease at the time of diagnosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes, currently experiencing hyperglycemia and concern for diabetic ketoacidosis. He has been on insulin since diagnosis and has never been prescribed oral agents.
